How do alchemists draw transmutation circles? In FMA, alchemists draw transmutation circles that are made up of perfect circles and regular polygons. 

Is it ever show how they make perfect circles and entirely equal angles? I know that it is difficult to free-hand draw things like that. Is anybody ever shown using rulers/compasses, or is it just understood that they are all able to free-hand circles/polygons without them?
